comments:
Error loading new wizard to create a new connection profile of ODA Flatfile.

 Build date: 3.0.0.20060303-0920
 OS: Windows 2003 Server R2 Japanese
 Steps:
        1- Create a new Report Project and open Data Source Exploer view
        2- Right click on the ODA Data Source and select New
        3- New Connection Profile launched and click "Next" button 
Then I got the error panel: 
Error loading new wizard in 
"org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.flatfile.ui"!

Here is the consolelog.

Was this installed together with BIRT plugins?  This appears to be a co-installation issue:

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
org.eclipse.birt.core.framework.IConfigurationElement

Please check your workspace/plugins folder, and see whether there are 2 "org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda_3.0.0.* " plugin folders.
Feel free to re-open this bug if this is not the case.

If so, the problem is that the ODA plugin folder distributed by BIRT does not have a "lib/birt-core.jar" file included (thus the NoClassDefFoundError), whereas the DTP ODA version does.  This was a temporary solution for BIRT users, not expecting the same users will use DTP Data Source Explorer as well.

This problem has been fixed in DTP ODA since its org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda_3.0.0.200603141 version  (Bugzilla #131450).
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 131450 ***
The problem does not occur with 3.0.0.200603011 build.
